channel.title: Pasargad village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pasargad village" - We're going into the war in 3 days.If we get 7 other players joining us we will also get jonin council on that day.

item.title: Re: Pasargad village
item.content:encoded: I bought war council and now i'm waiting for members to go NRF.We need 4 more ninjas.

item.title: Pasargad village
item.content:encoded: We're going into the war in 3 days.If we get 7 other players joining us we will also get jonin council on that day.
